about_the_game:
Lead the Zombie Invasion

Have you ever wanted to control zombies and unleash them on humans? of different types. You can start a zombie epidemic by creating your zombies. Remember, people resist the epidemic. Cops, soldiers and more! Strategically kill your zombies. Overcome them and dominate humanity!

More blood, more comrades!

Remember that you can infect people with the zombie virus. After biting them with delight, they too they will turn into zombies and join their ranks!

That way, you'll be able to build an army of zombies.

Producing Zombies

The cost of producing zombies is blood. When you bite people, the amount of blood increases and you become zombies again.

you can produce. Remember, different types of zombies have different prices.

Zombie Features

Zombie types have different characteristics. While some zombies are attack oriented, some zombies are

It is defense oriented. Position high-health zombie types from the front and fight them. You can send it to the square. Attacking zombies from behind as the soldiers deal with them. You can position. Note that some types of zombies can kill people. People killing them doesn't turn them into zombies.

Human Traits

Ordinary people do not pose a threat to you. They try to run away from the zombies. But the purpose of military people is to protect other people. That's why they shoot their zombies and they kill them. Your priority is to kill military people. Otherwise, many zombies will be sacrificed. You may need to factor.

Gameplay

You can move the game camera with the arrow keys, rotate it with the Q and E keys. You can change it. You can position zombies with left click. By clicking the number keys. You can switch between zombies in your inventory. Zombie selected with the F key check out its features. In this panel, some of the zombie's attack power and defense power you can access information.

Key Game Features

• Story Mode

A story mode that tells the zombie epidemic by progressing on a level basis.

• Survival Mode

The mode where you try to survive as much as possible with your zombies.

Lead the Zombie Invasion

Have you ever wanted to control zombies and unleash them on humans? of different types. You can start a zombie epidemic by creating your zombies. Remember, people resist the epidemic. Cops, soldiers and more! Strategically kill your zombies. Overcome them and dominate humanity!

More blood, more comrades!

Remember that you can infect people with the zombie virus. After biting them with delight, they too they will turn into zombies and join their ranks!

That way, you'll be able to build an army of zombies.

name: Zombinions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 870
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)

short_description: Lead the zombie invasion by creating different types of zombies. Start the zombie epidemic in the world, make strategic moves using zombies with different characteristics and dominate humanity!
